body:
Comment 4 by **QQ510371827**: 
Hi, it seems as if Go's output format is utf-8 but windows cmd output is using cp936
which lead the weird results. After changing cmd into utf-8 mode(chcp 65001),i rebuilt
Go source, Now the fail information is:

--- FAIL: TestPacketConn (0.20 seconds)
        packetconn_test.go:105: PacketConn.ReadFrom failed: WSARecvFrom udp 127.
0.0.1:53439: i/o timeout
FAIL
FAIL    net     3.746s
--- FAIL: TestIdentityResponse (0.01 seconds)
        serve_test.go:453: error with Get of http://127.0.0.1:1309/?overwrite=1
 Get http://127.0.0.1:1309/?overwrite=1 EOF
FAIL

--- FAIL: TestWinSplitListTestsAreValid (1.09 seconds)
        path_windows_test.go:76: 7,0: execution error exit status 1
                "'printdir.cmd' is not recognized as an internal or external com
mand,\r\noperable program or batch file.\r\n"
        path_windows_test.go:76: 9,0: execution error exit status 1
                "'printdir.cmd' is not recognized as an internal or external com
mand,\r\noperable program or batch file.\r\n"
        path_windows_test.go:76: 11,0: execution error exit status 1
                "'printdir.cmd' is not recognized as an internal or external com
mand,\r\noperable program or batch file.\r\n"
        path_windows_test.go:76: 12,1: execution error exit status 1
                "'printdir.cmd' is not recognized as an internal or external com
mand,\r\noperable program or batch file.\r\n"
        path_windows_test.go:76: 13,1: execution error exit status 1
                "'printdir.cmd' is not recognized as an internal or external com
mand,\r\noperable program or batch file.\r\n"
FAIL
FAIL    path/filepath   27.224s


FYI,There was none 'printdir.cmd' file on my system %windir% directory and then i added
it according to an instruction(link: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/321379/en-us).
I also tried changing the regedit key name from 'Printdir.bat' into 'printdir.cmd' but
it does not work. It just said 'printdir.cmd' is not recognized as an internal or
external command.
